name: project-recall-root
description: AI-powered flashcard application with spaced repetition

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.build: npm run build --prefix backend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.test: npm test --prefix backend && npm test --prefix frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix --prefix backend && npm run lint:fix --prefix frontend
scripts.format: npm run format --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix backend && npm run clean --prefix frontend
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && rm -rf node_modules backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules
scripts.security:audit: npm audit --prefix backend && npm audit --prefix frontend
scripts.security:fix: npm audit fix --prefix backend && npm audit fix --prefix frontend
scripts.precommit: npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm test
